meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snub.
meanings.sent1: Her snubbiness was evident in the way she ignored everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: I could sense the snubbiness in her tone when she spoke to me.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snubbiness, we still tried to include her in our conversations.
meanings.sent4: The snubbiness in the room was so thick, you could almost touch it.
meanings.sent5: His snubbiness was like a dark cloud hanging over the gathering.

meanings.definition: The act of snubbing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her snubbiness towards him was quite hurtful.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the snubbiness in the air as she walked past without a word.
meanings.sent3: His snubbiness was so obvious, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The snubbiness in her actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The snubbiness of her behavior left a sour taste in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: Receiving a snubbiness from her was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The snubbiness of his response was quite clear.
meanings.sent3: Despite the snubbiness, he remained unfazed.
meanings.sent4: The snubbiness of the rejection stung deeply.
meanings.sent5: Her snubbiness was like a slap in the face.
